* BrightBlade knelt in front of Hell Beast and bowed her head, he truly was 
a commander!
She felt so small and insignificant compared to his rank, size, and 
mightyness.*

" My name is BrightBlade, My Lord."

* She held her tongue and waited for the next question that Hell Beast would 
ask, the first rule of being in a commander's presence...only speak when 
spoken to.*
